lead_paragraph: Experts say that findings from a study may help shift the way the United States government looks at a controversial class of chemicals.

headline.main: A Pesticide Is Harmful to Wild Bees, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: A Pesticide Is Harmful To Wild Bees, Study Finds

snippet: Experts say that findings from a study may help shift the way the United States government looks at a controversial class of chemicals.
